Dear Customers, We want to give our cats the best place to relax and live, so please follow the rules:

  • Please don’t put visiting cats on the tables.
  • Take care of your belongings to avoid damage.
  • Our cats like sitting on your laps, so please put one of our blankets on your legs first to avoid kitty hair getting on your clothes.
  • Do not pick up the cats when they are sleeping.
  • Be gentle with the cats.
  • Do not feed the dogs.
  • You are welcome to take photos but please turn off the flash.
  • Supervise children at all times.
  • Thank you! We look forward to welcoming you at our cafe and hope that you enjoy your time with our Kittys!

SPA POLICY

All cats entering A Pet Spa Grooming must be:

  • Free of any parasitic infestation

Join us for a Pawsome time
Author: Gráinne Moran
